mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board.post (post_id, user_id, post_regdate, post_updatedate, title, post_content, filename, post_heart, post_replycount, post_flag) VALUES (LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{userId}, #{postRegdate}, #{postUpdatedate}, #{title}, #{postContent}, #{filename}, #{postHeart}, #{postReplycount}, #{postFlag})
mapper.select: SELECT post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, post_regdate AS postRegdate, post_updatedate AS postUpdatedate, title AS title, post_content AS postContent, filename AS filename, post_heart AS postHeart, post_replycount AS postReplycount, post_flag AS postFlag FROM board.post WHERE post_id = #{postId}

SELECT post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, post_regdate AS postRegdate, post_updatedate AS postUpdatedate, title AS title, post_content AS postContent, filename AS filename, post_heart AS postHeart, post_replycount AS postReplycount, post_flag AS postFlag FROM board.post ORDER BY post_regdate DESC

SELECT post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, post_regdate AS postRegdate, post_updatedate AS postUpdatedate, title AS title, post_content AS postContent, filename AS filename, post_heart AS postHeart, post_replycount AS postReplycount, post_flag AS postFlag FROM board.post WHERE post_flag = "Y" ORDER BY post_regdate DESC LIMIT #{pageNum}, 5

SELECT post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, post_regdate AS postRegdate, post_updatedate AS postUpdatedate, title AS title, post_content AS postContent, filename AS filename, post_heart AS postHeart, post_replycount AS postReplycount, post_flag AS postFlag FROM board.post WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND post_flag = "Y" ORDER BY post_regdate DESC LIMIT #{pageNum}, 5
SELECT post_replycount FROM board.post WHERE post_id = #{postId}
SELECT post_heart FROM board.post WHERE post_id = #{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE board.post SET post_replycount = post_replycount + 1 WHERE post_id = #{postId}
UPDATE board.post SET post_replycount = post_replycount - 1 WHERE post_id = #{postId}
UPDATE board.post SET post_heart = post_heart + 1 WHERE post_id = #{postId}
UPDATE board.post SET post_heart = post_heart - 1 WHERE post_id = #{postId}
